name: Jumpy (itch)
description:
Jump, jump, jump! As high as you can go! Don't fall off, it's quite a steep drop. Grab a powerup to help you stay up high, and don't let your enemies knock you down from the top of the clouds!

Download Jumpy, the new platformer game for windows! The higher you jump, the more coins you collect. Coins? They're not for nothing! Go unlock new powerups in the shop, or buy different characters to jump with! Complete achievements to earn rewards and unlock new items. Beware, though - the higher you go, the harder it gets! Can you make it out of this world?
